slogan-1: Build internal tools at lightning speed
description: Anyone can build internal tools with ILLA Cloud in minutes.

meta.title: ILLA Cloud | Build internal tools at lightning speed!
meta.description: ILLA Cloud is an open-source low-code platform with react component library to build internal applications in minutes.

call-to-action.title: Start Building Apps with ILLA Cloud
call-to-action.desc: Any internal tool you need can be built using ILLA Cloud in 1 minute.

all.title: ILLA Cloud integrates everything
all.desc: ILLA Cloud provides dozens of out-of-the-box components and database integration, which can be used to build AI tools, Admin panels, Dashboards and other tools.
all.alt: ILLA empowers anyone to build the tools they need, regardless of their technical background. With its intuitive interface and drag-and-drop components, ILLA enables even non-technical users to create custom tools tailored to their specific requirements. You don't need to be an expert in programming or database management to build internal tools with ILLA. ILLA's integration and AI assistant simplify the process of connecting to data sources and generating queries, making tool creation accessible to a wide range of users. Whether you're a business professional, a marketer, or a small business owner, ILLA empowers you to build any tools you need.

components.title: Build beautify UI in minutes
components.desc-2: Construct application interfaces by simply drag-and-drop
components.alt: 1. Over 40 meticulously designed components, including essential elements such as tables, lists, charts, and forms, that are indispensable for your internal applications. 2. With our intuitive drag-and-drop interface, you can effortlessly construct application interfaces by simply selecting and placing the desired components. 3. All our components support configurable styles, eliminating the need for manual coding. This means you can achieve any style without any hassle or customization.

datasource.title: Connect to any data source
datasource.desc-1: With ILLA's GUI connector, you can quickly connect to all data sources
datasource.desc-2: ILLA ensures a smooth and secure data integration process
datasource.desc-3: You have full control over where your data is stored, as ILLA does not store any of your data connection information
datasource.alt: 1. Whether your data is stored in PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Google Sheets, REST API, GraphQL, or any other source, ILLA provides a secure integration approach that allows you to seamlessly connect and retrieve your data. 2. ILLA ensures a smooth and secure data integration process, empowering you to access and utilize your valuable information with ease. 3. You have full control over where your data is stored, as ILLA does not store any of your data connection information. When you run an action, ILLA directly sends the request to your backend, ensuring that your data remains secure and confidential. We prioritize privacy and data protection, allowing you to leverage the power of ILLA while maintaining complete control over your data storage and access.

collaboration.title: Real-time collaboration
collaboration.desc: Collaborate with your team members simultaneously, working together on the same application, regardless of geographical location
collaboration.alt: 1. Collaborate with your team members simultaneously, working together on the same application, regardless of geographical location. 2. With real-time collaboration features, you can make instant changes, share ideas, and synchronize your work in real-time. 3. Say goodbye to version control headaches and embrace the power of real-time collaboration for a truly collaborative and dynamic development experience.

SQL.title: Generate SQL with AI
SQL.desc: With our GPT-based AI assistant, you can input your requirements in natural language, then generate SQL with AI.
SQL.alt: 1. With our GPT-based AI assistant, you don't need to be an expert in writing SQL queries. You can simply input your requirements in natural language, and our assistant will generate the corresponding SQL queries for you. 2. By entrusting the query writing process to our reliable and efficient assistant, you can streamline your workflow, enhance productivity, and achieve optimal results in a shorter span of time.

code.title: Code anywhere you need it
code.desc-1: By writing JavaScript, you dynamically control components properties, event handlers, actions and other settings.
code.desc-2: 1. Using Transformers, you can write larger, reusable blocks of code for manipulating data.
code.alt: 1. Write JavaScript anywhere you desire, unlocking the ability to dynamically bind data or add processing logic using JavaScript. Integrate JavaScript into your applications and enjoy the flexibility and power it brings to your development process. 2. Write and save reusable code blocks that can be called from anywhere within your app in transformers. These transformers enable you to handle logic, transform data, or perform various operations, simplifying your development process.
code.action: Learn how to code in ILLA

sql-generate.introduction: With the SQL Generate feature, you can input natural language and get SQL statements that can be run directly. This works in databases like MySQL, Postgre, Supabase, etc.

ui-library.introduction: We have built dozens of components in ILLA Builder to meet the needs of developers in different scenarios. Developers can drag and drop to boost their productivity, which greatly saves the time on building internal tools.

for-developer.introduction: We offer developers a high degree of freedom to implement richer functionality through JavaScript, wrapping JS statements with {{Template Syntax}} to place at any string type variable spaces for more variety in the output.

date-integrate.introduction: ILLA can connect to the mainstream databases or any data connected through APIs and add actions to chain to user events. It tightly integrates the data obtained from the back-end with the front-end components, allowing developers to write simple data calls to achieve massive information interaction.

collaborative-develop.introduction: ILLA turns imagination into real codes and designs. Developers can work simultaneously in ILLA Builder by sharing links. Developers can co-edit and communicate with others in real-time to give timely feedback, which will greatly improve development efficiency.

drive.title: ILLA Drive
drive.desc-1: Use ILLA Drive to securely store files and share them with all members of your team.
drive.alt: 1. File storage and downloading: You can securely store files on ILLA Drive, and all members of your team can access them as needed.2. Public signed URLs with expiration: ILLA Drive allows you to generate public signed URLs for files, with the option to set an expiration time. This enables secure sharing of files with external parties for a limited time.3. Theft prevention links: You can enable theft prevention links on ILLA Drive, which restrict access to files only through your ILLA application. This ensures that files can only be accessed within the context of your ILLA application.4. Seamless integration with ILLA Builder: You can upload or select files directly within the ILLA Builder interface, simplifying the process of incorporating files into your application.
drive.desc-2: ILLA Drive simplifies the content delivery process, allowing you to focus on delivering exceptional content.
drive.desc: A user-friendly CDN solution to accelerate your web content effortlessly.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Any other questions? Feel free to <0>ask ILLA on Discord</0>

content.question: What is ILLA Cloud?
content.answer: ILLA Cloud is a low-code platform that inherits multiple capabilities from ILLA Builder and ILLA Drive. It provides a seamless experience by allowing users to log in and register to access its features. With ILLA Cloud, you can effortlessly build internal tools, dashboards, CRUD (create, read, update, delete) applications, and more. The platform significantly improves work efficiency and helps companies save costs.

content.question: Who can use ILLA Cloud
content.answer: Whether you are a product manager, full-stack developer, project manager, data analyst...anyone can use ILLA Cloud to build tools: From designing front-end interfaces with drag-and-drop components to integrating with data sources and generating queries using AI assistance, ILLA provides a streamlined experience that removes unnecessary complexities. You don't need to be a tech expert to create your own applications.

content.question: What kinds of applications can you develop using ILLA Cloud?
content.answer: 1. Rapid idea implementation: When enterprises experience a high demand for internal tools during rapid growth, ILLA can significantly accelerate the development speed and quality of your internal applications. This helps expedite your company's growth by quickly addressing the tooling needs. 2. No skill limitations for editors: With ILLA, any individual within the organization can build the tools they need without requiring specialized teams or technical skills. This empowers employees across various roles to create their own solutions, fostering innovation and productivity. 3. Cost reduction: By leveraging ILLA, enterprises can allocate their time, workforce, and financial resources towards core business activities. This results in reduced costs as ILLA streamlines the development process, eliminates the need for specialized teams, and minimizes the investment required for tooling development.

content.question: What problems can ILLA Cloud solve?
content.answer: With ILLA Cloud, you can build any application you need, such as commonly used internal tools like Dashboards, Admin Panels, CRUD apps, CRM, CMS, and more. Additionally, you can develop AI applications, such as text-to-image applications with Stable Diffusion, audio-to-text applications with Whisper, and even embed OpenAI's GPT models to assist you in completing various tasks.

content.question: Which data sources does ILLA support?
content.answer: ILLA supports integration with a variety of data sources, including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, REST API, GraphQL, Google Sheets, and more. You can swiftly connect to any data source without writing code, enabling seamless access to your desired data.

deployment.title: Flexible deployment
deployment.introduction: ILLA provides two ways to deploy. Developers can use the ILLA Cloud to quickly start building their apps on any device. We also provide ILLA CLI for free with better security to ensure data safety.

illa-cloud.title: ILLA Cloud
illa-cloud.des: Try one-click deployment and enjoy the easiest deployment experience

illa-CLI.title: ILLA CLI
illa-CLI.des: The fastest and easiest way to self-host ILLA

kubernetes.title: Kubernetes
kubernetes.des: Deploy ILLA into Kubernetes by using ILLA Helm chart
